name: Spy-D3r
description:
Spy-D3r is a game where you play as a spider, and you can go over any surface, putting together with stealth mechanics thats the result i got.

This is a litle prototype about an idea, i'm a programmer so all the assets are from the asset store, i hope you enjoy it, i'll wait for your feedback :)

With this game i want to explore the options of begin a spider and all the mechanics i can test to do.
